commands.commandDescription: Inspecting the traffic, can give you valuable information such as the domain name and user account

linuxCommands.commandGroupDescription: In Linux you can use Responder to intercept the global interception

commands.commandTitle: Kerberos Pre-Auth Bruteforcing to identify valid username
commands.commandDescription: You can use KRB-PRE-AUTH queries against the DC to get a response on whether the account is valid or not (using a valid account can lock out the account based on domain password policy)
